lite__connect__descr: It's that simple. Making the most painful thing in DeFi becomes easy and enjoyable.
lite__durable__descr_para_one: No fear of soaking in water or tearing by hand.
lite__durable__descr_para_two: No more worrying about the recovery phrase note being smudged, the ink falling out, being put in the washing machine, being eaten by the dog, being torn to pieces by the children or being thrown away by mum as waste paper.
lite__security__descr: No need to worry about your OneKey Lite being taken away
lite__shipping__descr: Orders shipping to an eligible international destination with at least 1 OneKey Lite, qualify for free international shipping.
